DOC.detailed_description: Prospective investigator-blinded study involve 25 adult male female subject vitiligo back hand . Punch minigrafting perform hand take skin thigh and/or buttock . Light treatment administer start week one grafting . One hand receive narrow-band ultraviolet B light receive focal 308-nm light treatment . Light treatment administer 3 time per week 12 week . A long term follow-up visit complete week 25 . The investigator evaluate subject week 4 , 7 , 13 25 addition screen baseline evaluations/procedures .
